continuousshots: Up to 5 frames per second 10, 30 or 60 fps using Electronic (Hi) shutter
whitebalancing: All Except Manual With Fine Tuning, Auto, Cloudy, Direct Sunlight, Flash, Fluorescent, Incandescent, Manual, Shade
imageformat: JPEG (NEF (RAW) 12, NEF (RAW + JPEG), EXIF 2.3, DCF, DPOF)
shootingmodes: Motion Snapshot (16:9), Movie (Hd 16:9, Slow Motion 8:3), Smart Photo Selector (3:2), Still Image (3:2)
